title: Tools for Advanced Bioinformatics Course
text: AvanceradBioinformatikPackage provides tools workflows data preprocessing analysis part Advanced Bioinformatics course Umeå University. main purpose package identifying optimal spacer sequences gene knockout using CRISPR-Cas9.

title: Tools for Advanced Bioinformatics Course
code: # If not already installed devtools, run: install.packages("devtools")   # Install the package devtools::install_github("Sladderdask/AvanceradBioinformatikPackage")

title: Tools for Advanced Bioinformatics Course
code: Rscript requirements.R pip install -r requirements.txt #example usage library(AvanceradbioinformatikPackage)  result <- fun(5) print(result)

title: Tools for Advanced Bioinformatics Course
text: program can containerized using Docker easily use code despite different locally versions programs. Dockerfile can found downloaded repository.

title: Tools for Advanced Bioinformatics Course
text: build Docker image, run following command project root directory

title: Tools for Advanced Bioinformatics Course
code: docker run -d  -- name CRISPR_KO_screening -p 8787:8787 -e PASSWORD=YOURPASSWORD CRISPR_KO_screening

title: FunTitle — fun
code: fun() #> Error in fun(): could not find function "fun"

title: onehotfun — onehotfun
text: Takes nucleotide sequences 20 nt lenght returns dataframe row one hot encoded version sequence nucleotide separate column

title: onehotfun — onehotfun
text: dataframe 20 columns column represents position sequence.

title: onehotfun — onehotfun
code: seqs <- c("ATGCGTACGTAGCTAGCTAG", "CGTACGTAGCTAGCTAGCTA") onehotdf <- onehotfun(seqs) #> Error in onehotfun(seqs): could not find function "onehotfun" head(onehotdf) #> Error: object 'onehotdf' not found
